entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
